lore: Known to mortals as the handmaidens of Slaanesh, these daemons are a mixture of the beautiful and the monstrous, made all the more disturbing by the visceral clash of both. They delight in the carnage of battle, weaving around enemiesâ€™ clumsy blows as they shrill and sigh their delight amidst swift-taloned slaughter.

otherAbilities.Swift-taloned Slaughter:: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If the target of that attack is within range of an objective marker , you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.
